# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal for CBSA Regional Processing Center Accommodations and Food Distribution Support

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Number**: WS3728489965
**Reference Number**: WS3728489965-Doc3731476156

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for accomodations and food distribution support, medical first aid, and site management services at the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) Regional Processing Center in St-Bernard de Lacolle, Quebec.

**Key Dates:**

* **Publication Date**: November 1, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 23, 2022, 2:00 PM EST (Note: The previous deadline has been amended, and all bids must be submitted by the revised closing time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 31, 2024

**Tender Requirements:**

* Accommodations and food distribution support
* Medical first aid services
* Site management services for refugees at the CBSA Regional Processing Center

**Submission Requirements:**

* Proposals must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery
* Supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by the revised closing time (November 23, 2022, 2:00 PM EST)
* Late bids will be declared non-responsive

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* The Selection Committee will evaluate proposals based on the lowest price

**Contact Information:**

* Contact Person: Stephane Chevrier, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: [stephane.chevrier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stephane.chevrier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14508017?extsite=MTQ1MDgwMTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14508017?extsite=MTQ1MDgwMTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) (Ariba Discovery) 

**Disclaimer:**
Please note that this tender has been made publicly available on the Ariba Discovery website. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) is applicable to this procurement. The procurement is open to all eligible bidders, subject to compliance with the tender
